qas.question: What country has provided Burma with the most military aid ?

answers.text: Myanmar has received extensive military aid from China

qas.question: How long has Burma participated in the group ASEAN ?

answers.text: Myanmar has been a member of ASEAN since 1997

qas.question: What year was Myanmar the host for the ASEAN conference?
What event caused tension between Burma and Bangladesh in 2008 ?

answers.text: natural gas in a disputed block of the Bay of Bengal

context: <a0_0>Myanmar has received extensive military aid from China<a0_0/> in the past <a1_0>Myanmar has been a member of ASEAN since 1997<a1_0/>. Though it gave up its turn to hold the ASEAN chair and host the ASEAN Summit in 2006, it chaired the forum and <a2_0>hosted the summit in 2014<a2_0/>. In November 2008, Myanmar's political situation with neighbouring Bangladesh became tense as they began searching for <a3_0>natural gas in a disputed block of the Bay of Bengal<a3_0/>. Controversy surrounding the Rohingya population also remains an issue between Bangladesh and Myanmar.
